title: Night of dark shadows
brief_description: Adapted from the television series “Dark shadows” this film tells the story of artist Charles Collins and his new wife, and of things that go bump in the night. After moving into his recently inherited family mansion, Collins begins to experience strange dreams - dreams of the past, dreams that suddenly are not dreams any more. Will he follow the same path as his family before? Cast includes David Selby, Monica Rich, Christopher Pennock, Lara Parker, Grayson Hall, Diana Millay.
